publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1023.1 Alex Johnstone: Failure to Reinstate Arbroath to Assisted Area Status—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1023) in the name of Mr Andrew Welsh, leave out from "understands" to end and insert "; asks the Scottish Executive to ensure that Arbroath is contained within the EU Objective 2 structural fund boundary due to be finalised later this year, and urges Angus Council to make representations with immediate effect to the Executive’s Minister of Finance to ensure such inclusion". Supported by: Ben Wallace*
